title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 25 September 2012 - XWiki
content:
13:51 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:52 <vmassol> I get the spinning wheel but it never stops  
13:52 <+sburjan> let me try  
13:53 <vmassol> I also have a problem with http://pastebin.com/im1wEZ6J  
13:53 <vmassol> first image is loaded ok but not the second one  
13:54 <vmassol> mflorea: I think there might be a bug...  
13:56 <+sburjan> vmassol: yes I get the spinning wheel also. and Sandbox.WebHome has only one image attaches from what I see  
13:56 <+mflorea> vmassol: I'll check  
13:58 <+sburjan> vmassol: so if i use that script to access the page itself. (the reference to point to the document itself) it works. But pointing to another document I get the spinning wheel  
13:59 <+sburjan> vmassol: should I report this ?  
14:02 <vmassol> sburjan: yes, unless mflorea wants to report it or look before reporitng  
14:02 <+mflorea> let me check first  
14:07 <+sburjan> I have another question. I have a page with 30 attachments. I delete it. I can see the deleted page in the Document Index. But I don't see the deleted attachments in the Deleted Attachments tab. is this normal ?  
14:21 <+sburjan> I can't find any issue in jira about this.  
14:48 <vmassol> removinfg spam users on xwiki.org  
14:52 <CIA-122> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-portlet-3.5.x \* rc7ba641 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/c7ba641c5b6e21d4a108395f2348fb65ebc509a9 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/resources/uicomponents/viewers/comments.js : Fix comment editing in Portlet mode. - http://git.io/97zXgQ  
14:59 <+mflorea> vmassol, sburjan: it's not a gallery macro bug. Just try the include separately and you'll see that images aren't loaded, because include means the content is rendered in the context of the current document, and the images are probably included using relative referece.  
14:59 <+mflorea> {{gallery}}{{display reference="Sandbox.WebHome"/}}{{/gallery}} works fine  
15:00 <+mflorea> I'll update the example  
15:04 <+sburjan> could someone answer my question about deleted page and attachments ?  
15:14 <jvdrean1> has joined #xwiki  
15:16 <jvdrean> has quit  
15:22 <coud> has joined #xwiki  
15:24 <vmassol> mflorea: i'vr tried separately and it worked fine  
15:24 <vmassol> http://pastebin.com/im1wEZ6J  
15:24 <+mflorea> what did you try? {{include reference="Sandbox.WebHome"/}} ?  
15:25 <vmassol> no the other example  
15:25 <vmassol> trying this one now  
15:25 <+mflorea> so the paste you gave me doesn't work for you?  
15:26 <vmassol> "vmassol  
15:26 <vmassol> 1:53  
15:26 <vmassol> I also have a problem with http://pastebin.com/im1wEZ6J  
15:26 <vmassol> 1:53  
15:26 <vmassol> first image is loaded ok but not the second one  
15:26 <vmassol> 1:54  
15:26 <vmassol> mflorea: I think there might be a bug..."  
15:28 <vmassol> re the relative image ok. I thought we were resolving based on the soruce though but I may have forgotten what we do  
15:29 <+mflorea> vmassol: http://pastebin.com/im1wEZ6J works for me  
15:29 <vmassol> both images?  
15:29 <+mflorea> it's the same image, and yes, clicking next loads it again  
15:29 <vmassol> fails here  
15:29 <vmassol> spinning wheel forever  
15:30 <+mflorea> I'm on latest 4.3 snapshot and FF 15.01  
15:30 <vmassol> I'll try again later on a clean version  
15:30 <vmassol> although mine should be quite clean  
15:30 <vmassol> and I can't see how my storgae changes would casue any chage  
15:31 <vmassol> trying with FF  
15:31 <vmassol> hmm  
15:31 <vmassol> works on FF  
15:32 <vmassol> so it seems to bug in chrome only  
15:43 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
15:45 <+mflorea> let me test on Chrome  
16:25 <CIA-122> Vincent Massol master \* r849744d https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/849744d2eac464a67defe968dc85265fa1a0855c / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-8247: Properly stop HSQLDB and clean the connection pool at XWiki shutdown - http://git.io/U7hWEw  
16:25 <CIA-122> Vincent Massol master \* r211782c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/211782c319289d781e65ecb99bdbc035387c261d / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/XWiki.java : [Misc] Better variable name - http://git.io/dfgFMw  
16:30 <CIA-122> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* rd0a7c06 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/d0a7c06039cd6e66669ecf883cab5b96e79b430d / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/resources/uicomponents/widgets/gallery/gallery.js : XWIKI-8249: Gallery macro keeps loading if two consecutive images are the same - http://git.io/L2Oi7Q  
16:38 <vmassol> thanks mflorea  
16:38 <vmassol> although it's a corner case apparently...  
16:39 <vmassol> people will probably not put the same image twice (although it can happen;))  
16:39 <+mflorea> yes, but still good to have it fixed  
16:42 <vmassol> yes  
16:42 <+Enygma`> vmassol: I don`t know about xhtml support as the default language, but is this a regression? http://xwiki.markmail.org/thread/lq7yef3352p65eyg  
16:43 <vmassol> I'll check  
16:43 <vmassol> it's supposed to work  
16:43 <vmassol> no idea about regression though  
16:43 <vmassol> I don't think we have any test for that (end to end)  
16:43 <vmassol> did he say it was working before?  
16:44 <+Enygma`> no idea :)  
16:56 <vmassol> Enygma`: found some issue, I'm on it  
17:15 <vmassol> Enygma`: pom.xml are wrong in XE  
17:16 <vmassol> (possibly elsewhere too)  
17:16 <vmassol> they have wrong parents  
17:16 <vmassol> on master  
17:16 <vmassol> parent point to 4.2-SNAPSHOT  
17:19 <vmassol> same in other repo  
17:19 <vmassol> repos  
17:26 <+Enygma`> vmassol: I know, taking care of it and documenting it. It seems that it's "normal" but it was not documented anywhere  
17:27 <vmassol> well it's not normal, it needs to be fixed  
17:27 <vmassol> ok I'll let you fix it  
17:27 <+Enygma`> the maven release plugin does not increment parent versions (and other properties that we use), so this is an extra step in the release process when releasing RCs  
17:27 <vmassol> btw I know why the guy has the issue, I'm replying  
17:27 <+Enygma`> cool  
17:27 <vmassol> yes it's an extra step  
17:27 <vmassol> now  
17:28 <vmassol> there are solution to make this easy  
17:28 <vmassol> using the versions plugin for ex  
17:28 <vmassol> http://mojo.codehaus.org/versions-maven-plugin/  
17:29 <+Enygma`> sounds interesting  
17:32 <coud> Hi, i would like to have my xwiki application (macros, authoring template, design sheet) stored in git. I saw http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/VersionControl and discussion down on the page but the last comment is 3 years old. Is there some best practice how to version the application ?  
17:33 <vmassol> coud: you can use our git extension  
17:33 <vmassol> coud: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/GitHubApp  
17:33 <vmassol> (hmm it's a github extenson not a git one)  
17:34 <vmassol> we also have a svn extension: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/SVN+Application  
17:34 <vmassol> I'm not sure the github extension really requires github (I don't see why it would....)  
17:37 <coud> vmassol the github extension looks good. I'm using bitbucket but it it shouldn't be to hard to change configuration  
17:37 <coud> thanks  
17:41 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
17:42 <vmassol> Enygma`: do you want me to fix the pom? I need them fixed quickly to continue work  
17:47 <CIA-122> Eduard Moraru master \* rdde62a6 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/dde62a6fa37268b2969f79b147f8cedaa435a7ab / pom.xml : [release] Incremented parent versions and/or version properties for the next development iteration - http://git.io/FKXaYg  
17:47 <vmassol> :)  
17:48 <CIA-122> Eduard Moraru master \* rfe1eb63 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/fe1eb63bc26d3e9aeb66b171c94d9686ab2d6c67 / pom.xml : [release] Incremented parent versions and/or version properties for the next development iteration - http://git.io/yADwzg  
17:48 <CIA-122> Eduard Moraru master \* r11d96e7 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/11d96e7f1779c5f5f2b067ada82435399c82de90 / (2 files in 2 dirs): [release] Incremented parent versions and/or version properties for the next development iteration - http://git.io/SaV4TQ  
17:49 <CIA-122> Eduard Moraru master \* rd603e3a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-manager/commit/d603e3a18394be8f16838adbbfd827c420c9bf70 / pom.xml : [release] Incremented parent versions and/or version properties for the next development iteration - http://git.io/NJwmzw  
17:49 <CIA-122> Eduard Moraru master \* rc27736b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/c27736b9dce3ac8e7a252ff448ab41e2b4e5a862 / (pom.xml xwiki-rendering-standalone/pom.xml): [release] Incremented parent versions and/or version properties for the next development iteration - http://git.io/7w9Kew  
17:50 <+Enygma`> :) sorry... should be good now  
17:53 <vmassol> coud: the github extension doesn't do any clone...  
17:54 <vmassol> note that I have also coded a git module which does a git clone so it should be possible to use that as a base too for an extension that would commit/update to/from a local git clone  
17:54 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Git+Module

19:16 <jvelo> has quit  
19:18 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
19:19 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Can you explain why you used xaction\_save instead of action\_save here? https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes-ui/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/WizardStep.xml#L115  
19:19 <@sdumitriu> AFAIK, the action buttons names start with action\_, not xaction\_  
19:25 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: I renamed the button on purpose to avoid the request to go through the Action filter. See https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes-ui/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditSheet.xml#L905 . I needed the page to submit to itself, so that I can process the data before the document is saved. This is a hack to overcome the limitation that we don't have
